attributes.description: A categorization of specific error types causing flow failures. Use this to identify the most common blockers (e.g., "OTP Expired") preventing users from completing their journey.
attributes.title: Top Flow Failure Reasons

attributes.description: A split between Client Errors (4xx - e.g., bad input, wrong OTP) and Server Errors (5xx - e.g., timeouts, database crashes). Use this to determine if failures are due to user behavior or system instability.
